issue.title: [C++] Add buffered output class implementing OutputStream interface
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2319](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2319). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This purpose of this is to throttle smaller writes to the actual underlying `OutputStream` interface, which might be a file or network protocol.
